description: Give Caesar salad a seafood makeover with cooked Australian tiger prawns. With crispy garlic croutons, this salad can be enjoyed as a side or main.
keywords: Caesar salad,Quick & easy dinner,Prawn,Quick & easy lunch,Seafood dishes
name: Prawn Caesar Salad With Garlic Croutons Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 crusty jumbo long bread roll, halved lengthways, thinly sliced
2 baby cos lettuce, trimmed, leaves separated
20 thawed cooked Australian jumbo tiger prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook bread, turning, for 5 minutes or until golden. Reduce heat to mediumlow and cook for 3 minutes to crisp. Add garlic and toss to coat. Transfer to a plate. Wipe pan clean and place over medium-high heat. Cook bacon, stirring occasionally, for 3 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer to paper towel-lined plate to drain.
Arrange lettuce, prawns, bacon and croutons on a platter. Drizzle with dressing and scatter over half the parmesan. Season with pepper and serve with lemon and remaining parmesan.
